description: Use of the site for the storage of motor vehicles (Application for a Lawful Development Certificate for an Existing Use or Operation)
decision_conditions: The existing use of the land to store vehicles does not constitute Lawful Development under Section 191 of Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 10 of the Planning and Compensation Act 1991 as the applicant has not demonstrated on the balance of probability that enforcement notices served against the use of the land in the 1970s and 1980s, which includes the use for the parking and storage of vehicles are no longer in force. Notwithstanding the above, it has also not been adequately demonstrated that the use has existed and been continuous for at least a period of ten years, prior to the date of this application.
